faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.question1: How to prepare for the procedure and what care is needed afterward?
faq.answer1: Detailed information about preparation and post-procedure care can be found here.
faq.answer2: Detailed information about contraindications for each procedure can be found here.
faq.question3: What to choose: electroepilation or laser hair removal?
faq.answer3:
Our specialists will help you choose the best hair removal method that suits your skin type, hair color, and the area you want to treat.

Laser Hair Removal:
✔ Suitable for dark hair and fair skin (modern lasers can also work on darker skin, but there are still some limitations).
✔ The procedure is fast, especially for large areas.
✔ Less painful compared to electroepilation.

Electroepilation:
✔ Permanently removes hair by destroying each follicle individually.
✔ Suitable for all hair types (even light and gray hair).
✔ Can be performed on all skin phototypes.
faq.question4: At what age can hair removal/depilation be done?
faq.answer4:
Laser Hair Removal: Officially allowed from the age of 18. In some cases, the procedure can be performed earlier, but only with written parental or guardian consent.

Sugaring and Wax Depilation: Regular procedures can start from the age of 12-14. If unwanted hair appears early and causes psychological discomfort, the procedure can be done earlier, with parental consent.
faq.answer5: We use the modern European diode laser Alvi Prague DL-7000, 2024 model. This device ensures effective and safe hair removal thanks to advanced technology and high power. Its innovative cooling system guarantees comfort during the procedure, and its settings allow adaptation to different skin and hair types. This device features a short pulse – 20 joules in 25 ms! This is the optimal flash duration for effective hair removal while ensuring skin safety.
faq.question6: Does laser hair removal remove ingrown hairs?
faq.answer6: Laser hair removal can help reduce the number of ingrown hairs, as it affects the hair follicle, destroying it and decreasing the likelihood of hair growing inward in the future.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.intro: We, MS Studio (hereinafter referred to as the "Company", "we", "our"), are committed to ensuring the confidentiality and protection of the personal data of our clients and users of our website. This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, process, and protect your personal information.

sections.dataCollection: We may collect and use the following categories of personal information:
sections.contactDetails: Contact details: Name, phone number, email address, postal address.
sections.bookingInfo: Booking information: Records of your visits, procedures, and preferences.
sections.technicalInfo: Technical information: IP address, browser type, operating system, cookies, and other identifiers.
sections.paymentInfo: Payment data: If you make a payment through our website, we collect your card details and process payments through secure payment services.
sections.purpose: We collect your data for the following purposes:
sections.services: Providing services, including appointment scheduling and consultations.
sections.communication: Communicating with you about bookings, schedule changes, or other important matters.
sections.promotion: Sending promotional materials, news, and special offers (with the option to opt out).
sections.security: Improving customer service quality and optimizing website performance.
sections.dataSharing: We do not share your personal data with third parties, except in the following cases:
sections.serviceProviders: When necessary to provide services (e.g., processing payments).
sections.dataRetention: We retain your personal data for the period necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy or as required by law.
sections.yourRights: You have the following rights regarding your personal data:
sections.rightToAccess: Right to access your personal data.
sections.rightToCorrect: Right to correct inaccurate or incomplete data.
sections.rightToDelete: Right to delete data ("right to be forgotten").
sections.policyChanges: We reserve the right to update this Privacy Policy at any time. Updates will be posted on this page, and we will notify you of significant changes via email or other means.
sections.usageRights: By browsing the Site, you agree not to copy, download, publish, broadcast, make available for commercial use, or otherwise use the content of the Site, except for personal, non-commercial purposes. You also agree to respect copyright (related) and other intellectual property rights to the content of the Site, not to adapt, modify, or create derivative works from any elements of the Site's content, except for personal, non-commercial purposes (which do not aim to obtain commercial profit). Any other use of the Site's content, except for personal non-commercial purposes, is possible only with the prior consent of the Site Administration.
sections.contactUs: If you have any questions about the Rules, suggestions, or comments – feel free to contact us
